trends: There have been 21 other sightings in Marietta
There were no other sightings in Marietta on or around January 19th 2010
divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving down Hwy 92 headed toward Woodstock right past Sandy Plains Road when I saw a bright white light shining about 100-150 yards off to my left above some trees about another 100-150 yards up. It was almost as bright as if someone were shining a flashlight directly into your eyes. I had to stop at a red light about 30 seconds after I first saw it and watched it for about 2 mins before I kept moving. It did not move the entire time I sat at the light and then all of a sudden, as I drove just past it, I watched it plummet straight down almost like a shooting star but directly towards the ground. I immediately stuck my head out the window and listened for a crash but never heard one. I couldn't tell how far out it was from the road or how to begin looking for it so I kept driving home. I have never been so terrified by something that I could not explain in my life. I had no idea what I saw but I'm not crazy and I'm not a liar and I know I saw something. I can't really explain my exact feelings about it right after other than fear and disbelief.
